00029 #include "OxygenBasedCellKiller.hpp"
00030 #include "ApoptoticCellProperty.hpp"
00031 
00032 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00033 OxygenBasedCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::OxygenBasedCellKiller(AbstractCellPopulation<SPACE_DIM>* pCellPopulation)
00034     : AbstractCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>(pCellPopulation)
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00039 void OxygenBasedCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(CellPtr pCell)
00040 {
00041     if (pCell->HasCellProperty<ApoptoticCellProperty>() && !(pCell->HasApoptosisBegun()))
00042     {
00043         pCell->StartApoptosis();
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00047 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00048 void OxygenBasedCellKiller<SPACE_DIM>::TestAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00049 {
00050     for (typename AbstractCellPopulation<SPACE_DIM>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpCellPopulation->Begin();
00051         cell_iter != this->mpCellPopulation->End();
00052         ++cell_iter)
00053     {
00054         TestAndLabelSingleCellForApoptosis(*cell_iter);
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 template<unsigned DIM>
00059 void OxygenBasedCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile)
00060 {
00061     // No parameters to output
00062 
00063     // Call method on direct parent class
00064     AbstractCellKiller<DIM>::OutputCellKillerParameters(rParamsFile);
00065 }
00066 
00068 // Explicit instantiation
00070 
00071 template class OxygenBasedCellKiller<1>;
00072 template class OxygenBasedCellKiller<2>;
00073 template class OxygenBasedCellKiller<3>;
00074
